item.title: Observability
item.description: Page being translated from English to Portuguese (Brazil). Do you speak Portuguese (Brazil)? Help us to translate it by sending us pull requests! Table of Contents Selenium Grid Observability Distributed tracing Event logging Grid Observability Visualizing Traces Leveraging event logs References Selenium Grid Grid aids in scaling and distributing tests by executing tests on various browser and operating system combinations.
